about_the_game:
We confirm that an English version will be released in the future！！

The game is a roguelike deck-building game inspired by the I Ching. The game features 128 historical events based on traditional Chinese history, serving as the battleground for players. It also includes over 100 intriguing cards incorporating elements from the 64 hexagrams, Five Elements, Heavenly Stems, Earthly Branches, constellations, the Big Dipper, and other traditional Chinese symbols.

Players will travel through sixteen dynasties, from the Xia to the Qing, using a wide array of card skills and synergistic combinations in intense strategic battles to try and rewrite the history of Chinese dynasties! Additionally, each game presents a random Boss challenge, offering a stimulating experience that combines unpredictability and challenge.

With deep deck-building mechanics and real-time strategic duels, The game invites you to traverse 5,000 years of history, using the wisdom of the I Ching to unravel the ancient mysteries hidden in the annals of time!

1、Players will take on the role of a mysterious force manipulating the lives of people across different dynasties. By choosing from fifty character cards, you can imbue them with powerful and diverse enhancements, building your own winning deck!

2、Players must strategically play their character cards to reach the “Fate Number” set by the “Heavenly Veil.” The “Heavenly Veil” acts as the player's opponent, randomly generating negative effects to hinder the player's progress!

3、A Fresh Perspective on Card Games: Interpreting History Through the 64 Hexagrams of the I Ching —

"My fate is determined by me, not by the heavens." The history of China's sixteen ancient feudal dynasties is yours to rewrite!

Starting from the Xia Dynasty and ending with the Qing, the game features 104 historical events across sixteen feudal dynasties, forming a series of complex and ever-changing battles. Every move you make is a step in crafting your own version of Chinese history!

4、A Vast Collection of Cards with Unique Chinese Historical Features —

Drawing from the rich tapestry of Chinese history and culture, the game offers multiple decks for players to construct their winning strategies. Can you uncover the hidden secrets amidst endless possibilities and defy fate?

Special Ability Cards: 64 hexagram cards with special abilities inspired by the 64 Hexagrams of the I Ching

Consumable Cards: 28 constellation cards, 12 zodiac (Earthly Branch) cards, 12 immortal cards

Enhancements: 15 types of card enhancements

Treasures: 7 types of treasures

Bosses: 33 random Boss stages
